structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

text.section: Any officer who violates KRS 210.110 shall be fined not less than five hundred dollars ($500) nor more than five thousand dollars ($5,000) and his office or appointment shall without further action be vacant.
Any person who willfully violates KRS 210.130 or 210.220 shall be fined not less than twenty-five dollars ($25) nor more than one hundred dollars ($100).

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 9. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 60. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 25.
